Anchor | Backend, iOS, and Android | New York, NY | Full-time | Onsite | https://anchor.fm/jobs

Anchor is looking to define the future of radio and podcasts by reinventing the medium and democratizing creation, distribution, and consumption of audio. We've built a platform that allows anyone to very easily record and broadcast their voice to the world.

We're a small team (11 total, 5 engineers) of extremely hardworking, dedicated, collaborative people. We love a good challenge, and we move fast.

We just raised our Series A from a handful of amazing investors, namely Google Ventures and Accel (https://techcrunch.com/2017/09/28/anchor-raises-10-million-f...). We're growing quickly and intend to move even faster, which is why we're actively looking for three engineering roles: - Backend (Node.js, MySQL, AWS) - https://boards.greenhouse.io/anchor/jobs/4001832002#.WkvrMFQ... - iOS (Swift) - https://boards.greenhouse.io/anchor/jobs/4001831002#.WkvrOlQ... - Android (Kotlin) - https://boards.greenhouse.io/anchor/jobs/4001828002#.WkvrQFQ...
